project_descr: Address the changing nature of risks and the increasing exposure of their economies and livelihoods to risks.

outputs.output_descr:
RECs and the Africa's group of Negotiators (AGN) have strengthened technical capacities to promote the implementation of the Paris Agreement
Member states are enabled to deliver on National Determined Contributions (NDC) commitments and encourage public-private investment in renewable energy
